<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cast Down](/Feats.aspx?ID=4661) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

The sheer force of your faith can bring a foe crashing down. If the next action you use is to cast [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1552) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1554) to damage one creature, the target is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88) if it takes any damage from the spell. If the target critically fails its save against the spell, it also takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 minute.
